title: Most Fun 3150 Champ?
body:
So I want a new champ and I just hit 3300 ip with first win of the day. I was wondering who is the most fun 3150 champ? Preferably not a support but any other lane is fine. Also I don't care about how meta they are, or how op they are, I just want a champion who I can really enjoy playing.

Also sorry if I double posted or used the wrong forum discussion. I'm new to the forums and I tried writing this a couple times already and haven't succeeded.

replies.body:
{{champion:53}}  is most fun champion in game. cmon man. Play him AP Mid.

{{champion:84}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} very fun

 {{champion:98}} can be fun if you like getting Unkillablly tanky and being able to 1v1 anyone.

{{champion:41}}

{{champion:35}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:7}}  can be fun, but also can be very unfun. Got to snowball with early kills.

Not sure on who is 3150 but other then that it depends on what you like to play, which role.
Top - Gangplank or Olaf
Jungle - Nidalee or Olaf 
Mid - Anivia (My Main), Lux or if you like assassins either Katarina or Kassadin
Adc - out of all Marksmans in this range are bad or i don't find fun
Support - Sona or Blitzcrank 
These are the champions i find fun in that price range so it might be different to you aha  
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
Honestly right now with the reworks i reckon the 1350 range has a lot more fun champions then the 3150

Thanks! I agree, a lot of the 1350 champs are fun to play, but I already own all of them lol. I have Olaf, and I'm absolutely trash at Nidalee, but I will definitely try out Anivia as she looks really fun, and I've had my eye on Sona for a while now. As for ADC I'm thinking of getting twitch. Have you ever played him and if so is he fun or not really worth my IP?

Oh yeah twitch, adc isn't really my role but the ones i play are Vayne, Lucian but yeah I've had a ball with twitch jungle tbh and its getting better each patch I've seen so many twitch jungles now i have to try it out :)
K thanks bro. I play mainly top and ADC, and coincidentally my two ADC mains are Vayne and Lucian :).

The funnest champions are definitely personal and subjective to the player. I'd offer some advice though and that is to find the style of champion you like. For example I do well with and enjoy the long range AP mages. Morgana, Orianna, Lux and Zyra as an example are a few of the AP mages I like. I enjoy playing all of them but my number one champion I have fun with is Lux. Even though all the others are AP mages and I find them all fun I think Lux is just my number one and can always play a game with her and win or lose I'll have a good time.

> Also sorry if I double posted or used the wrong forum discussion. I&#039;m new to the forums and I tried writing this a couple times already and haven&#039;t succeeded.

Tristana is a fiddly but fun ADC in the low ranges. Can be played AP or AD, its fricken hilarious when your rocket jump resets from assist/kills in a team fight and you're contribution is literally just 3-5 jumps onto champs with your W, get good at it in team fights, though its not as strong as an auto, its just good fun jumping on peoples heads, seeing them die, and you jump on someone elses head instantly! 

Everyone wants to say AP blitz cause of the Q and R combo... but go top lane bruiser AD blitz... knowing people are scared of clear space between themselves and a blitz is hugely fun, anyone tries to stop you farming, just grab them and W and auto beat down, the moment they run, knock them up :P or just W/R them, keep beating, the moment they run, your slow ass 8-16second Q grab is available (generally trades only last a few seconds, so opening with Q as AD is not that good)... 

Once you hit 6, melee range is god... Q not needed, Q is for people who realize you're just gunna beat down and try to run. knock up into silence :) wins most trades, just realie its not AP, you'll do a bit of damage but top generally has some tankiness, the scale on the abilities won't last, you gotta learn how to melee with him appropriately :) 

Panth, is personal, i find him great fun, i know most people dont see how fragile he is and just ends up dying time and time again on him cause on the otherside of the coin, being able to virtually block the first 2 hits in a trade is godly and amazingly tank. Takes time to get down well, i don't seem to use him hugely well in rift (usually positive scores), but aram i find him to be... sweet jesus i cant remember the last time ive done a game worse than something like 12-4 15-5 10-3 etc and not just from trying to use Q to KS. But actually engaging well and fighting smart.
Miss Fortune, mainly because of her ultimate.
Miss Fortune was actually the most recent champion I bought haha. She's really fun though, and with the new MF build, your ult just shreds the enemy team.
Personally, my favourite champions in that price range have to be Shaco and Gangplank, they are just so enjoyable,
Thanks! I have gp but I'll definitely try out shaco, I like that assassin kind of play style anyway.
